snippet: Afghanistan has ordered a network of schools run by an organization regarded with suspicion by the Turkish government to be transferred to a foundation approved by Ankara, Afghan officials said....

headline.main: Australia Quicks Need to Bowl Straighter, Says Hazlewood
headline.print_headline: Australia Quicks Need to Bowl Straighter, Says Hazlewood

lead_paragraph: Afghanistan has ordered a network of schools run by an organization regarded with suspicion by the Turkish government to be transferred to a foundation approved by Ankara, Afghan officials said.
